description: Request to package files from a user's download list.

zipFileName.description: Optional parameter to set the name of the resulting zip file.

includeManifest.description: When set to true, a metadata manifest files will be include in the package.  The manifest will include all metadata for each file in the package.

csvTableDescriptor.description: Optional. Only used if includeManifest=true.  Describes how the CSV should be constructed.
